page.title: 16 The Cricket Club.
page.content: Winterborne Kingston Cricket Club was re-formed in 1950 after the war years. For a long time all the players lived in the village,but now that the population pattern has changed,men from many parts of Dorset play in the team,because of connections with the village. The team is now in Division One of The Dorset Cricket Association League. A committee,under the chairmanship of Alan Wellstead,one of the original founders of the team, control the activities of the club.The team captain is Peter Gale,who also takes care of the wicket and the rest of the ground. The cricket club also runs a very successful social club open to all residents in the area and providing many forms of entertainment.
